articles.author: Scharon Harding
articles.title: “Unacceptable”: Spotify bricking Car Thing devices in Dec. without refunds - Ars Technica
articles.description: Spotify stopped making Car Things in July 2022 but kept selling them.
articles.content:
100
Owners of Spotify's soon-to-be-bricked Car Thing device are begging the company to open-source the gadgets to save some the landfill. Spotify hasn't responded to pleas to salvage the hardware, w… [+4724 chars]
